title: Strictly's Alex and Neil Jones love being compared to Meghan and Harry
text:
Alex Scott and Neil Jones have been compared to Meghan Markle and Prince Harry (Picture: BBC/PA)

Strictly Come Dancing’s Alex Scott and Neil Jones are loving being compared to Meghan Markle and Prince Harry and even joked about becoming royal lookalikes.

The professional couple, who also broke their silence over romance rumours, have admitted that they’re often likened to the Duke and Duchess of Sussex and honestly, we now can’t unsee it.

‘We’ve had that a lot,’ Alex revealed.

He continued in conversation with HELLO! Magazine: ‘From the moment we were paired it’s like, look at those two, Harry and Meghan.’

Neil added that he and Alex could one day become professional royal lookalikes, because, why not?

Meghan and Harry have some Strictly lookalikes (Picture: AFP)

Neil and Alex are paired up on Strictly (Picture: PA)

Strictly viewers first noted Alex and Neil’s resemblance to Harry and Megs back when the 2019 series landed on our television screens.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I’ve just seen somewhere that Alex and Neil resemble Meghan and Harry and now I can’t unsee it,’ noticed one.

‘I love the fact Meghan and Harry are doing great so far. I hope they win this year,’ echoed another on Twitter.

The couple scored an incredible 33 points for their Charleston over the weekend, with judges Craig Revel Horwood, Motsi Mabuse, Alfonzo Ribeiro and Shirley Ballas collectively awarding 10 points more than the previous week.

Alex and Neil have been getting on like a house on fire during rehearsals since training started back in September, but have shrugged off any speculation of a romance.

‘There’s nothing on our minds but the show,’ Neil, who split from fellow Strictly professional Katya Jones in August after 11 years together, added to the publication.

‘We don’t have time to think about anything else.’

Strictly Come Dancing continues Saturday at 6.35pm on BBC One.

description: Strictly Come Dancing's Alex Scott and Neil Jones are loving the Meghan Markle and Prince Harry comparisons.
